physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a cluster of nutmeg fruits on a branch. There are three fruits that have split open
 showing the nutmeg seed inside. There is a smaller unripe nutmeg in the center of the photograph. There are a handful of leaves that are still attached to the branch. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The title is written at the bottom-right
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a cluster of nutmeg fruits on a branch. There are three fruits that have split open, showing the nutmeg seed inside. There is a smaller unripe nutmeg in the center of the photograph. There are a handful of leaves that are still attached to the branch. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The title is written at the bottom-right, below the photograph.
